Summary method for a discharge rating curve tournament

Source: R/tournament_methods.R
summary.tournament.Rd

Print the summary of a tournament of model comparisons

# S3 method for tournament
summary(object, ...)

Arguments

object

an object of class "tournament"
...

not used in this function

See also

tournament to run a dishcarge rating curve tournament and plot.tournament for visualizing the mode comparison

Examples

# \donttest{
data(krokfors)
t_obj <- tournament(Q~W,krokfors)

#> Running tournament:
#> 25% - gplm finished
#> 50% - gplm0 finished
#> 75% - plm finished
#> 100% - plm0 finished
summary(t_obj)

#>   round game model            B        DIC num_eff_param            P winner
#> 1     1    1  gplm 4.007971e-02 -1.5623636      6.143381 0.5790441616  FALSE
#> 2     1    1 gplm0 2.913731e-02 -0.7230154      6.416168 0.4209558384   TRUE
#> 3     1    2   plm 2.197139e-06 23.7427166      2.992841 0.9335632249   TRUE
#> 4     1    2  plm0 1.563588e-07 23.3603985      2.945563 0.0664367751  FALSE
#> 5     2    3 gplm0 2.913731e-02 -0.7230154      6.416168 0.9999245993   TRUE
#> 6     2    3   plm 2.197139e-06 23.7427166      2.992841 0.0000754007  FALSE
# }
